mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Questions (course_id, prompt, question_type, difficulty, supports_ai_grading, creator_id) VALUES ( #{courseId}, #{prompt}, #{questionType, typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumTypeHandler}, #{difficulty, typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumTypeHandler}, #{supportsAiGrading}, #{creatorId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE Questions SET prompt = #{prompt}, question_type = #{questionType, typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumTypeHandler}, difficulty = #{difficulty, typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumTypeHandler}, supports_ai_grading = #{supportsAiGrading} WHERE question_id = #{questionId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM Questions WHERE course_id = #{courseId} ORDER BY question_id
